org.apache.juneau.rest.util

Class CachingHttpServletRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
        • org.apache.juneau.rest.util.CachingHttpServletRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpServletRequest, ServletRequest

    public class CachingHttpServletRequest
extends HttpServletRequestWrapper
    Wraps an HttpServletRequest and preloads the body into memory for debugging purposes.
